name: Itinerant Mind Colony
description:
Minimalist side-scrolling shooter where you can't shoot. Instead, get near other ships to take control of them.

Controls:

- arrows keys to move

In slightly more detail:

You are an out-of-place mind colony.

Get near white squares to infect them. When your shrinking & expanding circle overlaps them, they'll change appearance -- this means they're infected. Infected ships can infect others.

You control all infected squares simultaneously with the arrow keys.

Squares are mutually destroyed when they collide.

Squares are also destroyed from getting shot too much.

If you bring an infected square too close to the edge of the screen, the infection will pass (and you will lose control of that square)

To beat each level, simply control a certain number of squares.

For Mini-LD #69 - Colonization

Warning: there may be bugs.
